query.name: findByStudyEventAndOIDs

query.name: countOfItemsToSDV
query.sql: SELECT COUNT(id.item_data_id) FROM item_data id JOIN event_crf ec ON ec.event_crf_id = ? JOIN item_form_metadata ifm ON ifm.crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id AND ifm.item_id = id.item_id JOIN edc_item_metadata edcim ON edcim.item_id = ifm.item_id AND edcim.event_definition_crf_id = ( SELECT event_definition_crf_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE crf_id = ( SELECT crf_id FROM crf_version WHERE crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id) AND study_event_definition_id = ( SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM study_event WHERE study_event_id = ec.study_event_id)) AND edcim.sdv_required = '1' LEFT JOIN dyn_item_form_metadata difm ON difm.item_form_metadata_id = ifm.item_form_metadata_id AND difm.event_crf_id = ec.event_crf_id AND difm.item_id = ifm.item_id AND difm.crf_version_id = ifm.crf_version_id WHERE id.event_crf_id = ec.event_crf_id AND not id.sdv AND ((difm.id is null and ifm.show_item = true) or (not(difm.id is null) and difm.show_item = true))

query.name: sdvCrfItems

JOIN item_form_metadata ifm ON ifm.crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id AND ifm.item_id = id.item_id JOIN edc_item_metadata edcim ON edcim.item_id = ifm.item_id AND edcim.event_definition_crf_id IN ( SELECT event_definition_crf_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE crf_id = ( SELECT crf_id FROM crf_version WHERE crf_version_id = ec.crf_version_id) AND study_event_definition_id = ( SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM study_event WHERE study_event_id = ec.study_event_id)) AND edcim.sdv_required = '1' LEFT JOIN dyn_item_form_metadata difm ON difm.item_form_metadata_id = ifm.item_form_metadata_id AND difm.event_crf_id = ec.event_crf_id AND difm.item_id = ifm.item_id AND difm.crf_version_id = ifm.crf_version_id WHERE id.event_crf_id = ec.event_crf_id AND ((difm.id is null and ifm.show_item = true) OR (not(difm.id is null) and difm.show_item = true)))
